name: Infinity Demo
detailed_description:
Infinity is a multiplayer game combined with magic shooting and MOBA elements.

Because the devs don't have enough budget to buy other VR headset (Now only HTC vive), we prepare a free demo for you.

We hope you try it,and share your comments to us.(Headset problems/Game suggestions)

Wish you have fun with it !


Introduction

Players will choose their favorite characters to fight alongside their teammates on the battlefield.

Helping your own troops to defeat their opponents through different tactical designs.

Victory conditions - break the opponent's base camp or scramble more strongholds when time's up.

Feature

1.With Bots. (If you want to play only yourself)

2.8 pre-designed characters for choosing.

3.Provide smoothly somatosensory magic shooting/ blocking, the Top player even can be unharmed in multiplayer fighting.

4. Reduce the burden during playing with well-designed moving and easy to understood operation.
